territories.name: Sacred Grove

passive_effects.description: Heroes regenerate 2% HP per turn
Earth heroes gain 10% defense

special_rules.description: Healing effects are 15% more effective

special_mechanics.description: 25% chance to root attackers for 1 turn

territories.description: A peaceful grove protected by ancient earth spirits. The very ground here pulses with life.

territories.name: Crystal Springs

passive_effects.description: Healing abilities are 20% more effective
10% chance to cleanse debuffs each turn

special_rules.description: Speed is increased by 10% for all heroes

special_mechanics.description: Attacks have 20% chance to slow nearby enemies

territories.description: Magical springs that flow with crystalline water. Legends say these waters can heal any wound.

territories.name: Ember Hills

passive_effects.description: Fire heroes gain 15% attack
Attacks have 15% chance to burn

special_rules.description: All enemies take 3% max HP damage per turn

special_mechanics.description: Enemies explode on death, dealing area damage

territories.description: Volcanic hills where flames dance eternally. The heat here forges warriors of incredible strength.

territories.name: Storm Peaks

passive_effects.description: Lightning heroes gain 20% speed
25% chance for attacks to chain

special_rules.description: Start of battle: All enemies are slowed for 1 turn

special_mechanics.description: Enemies have 20% dodge chance
Every 3 turns, all enemies gain 50% speed

territories.description: Mountain peaks wreathed in eternal storms. Lightning strikes here grant speed beyond mortal limits.

territories.name: Ancient Ruins

passive_effects.description: Heroes gain 30% more experience
Light heroes immune to blind and fear

special_rules.description: All abilities have -1 cooldown
Heroes cannot be one-shot (survive with 1 HP)

special_mechanics.description: Enemies start with 30% HP shield
Elite enemies revive once at 50% HP

territories.description: Crumbling ruins of a once-great civilization. Ancient magic still lingers in these stones.

territories.name: Shadow Realm

passive_effects.description: All attacks heal for 20% damage dealt
Dark heroes can execute enemies below 20% HP

special_rules.description: Heroes have 20% dodge chance
Enemies have 15% chance to be feared each turn

special_mechanics.description: All enemy attacks heal them for 30% damage
Elites spawn a clone at 50% HP

territories.description: A realm where shadows have taken physical form. Reality itself bends to darkness here.

territories.name: Elemental Nexus

passive_effects.description: All elemental advantages are increased by 50%
Heroes gain random element buff each turn

special_rules.description: Elements randomly shift each turn
Using 5 different elements grants team-wide ultimate

special_mechanics.description: Enemies change element when hit
On death, enemies deal their element damage to all

territories.description: A convergence point of all elemental energies. The very fabric of magic is visible here.

territories.name: Divine Sanctum

passive_effects.description: Revive first fallen hero at 30% HP
All heroes immune to curse and fear

special_rules.description: Lethal damage has 30% chance to be negated
Buffs spread to adjacent allies

special_mechanics.description: Counters all debuff attempts with damage
Enemies heal 5% per turn

territories.description: A holy shrine blessed by divine power. The gods themselves watch over this sacred place.

territories.name: Primordial Chaos

passive_effects.description: Random stats increased by 50% each battle
25% chance to ignore any attack

special_rules.description: Every 3 turns, all heroes gain random legendary buff
Heroes can temporarily evolve mid-battle
Normal rules don't always apply

special_mechanics.description: Enemies randomly change form and abilities
Attacks can hit through immunity
Buffs and debuffs randomly swap targets

territories.description: The birthplace of chaos itself, where reality bends and breaks. Only the strongest dare enter.

territories.name: Celestial Throne

passive_effects.description: All heroes gain flying and +30% all stats
Immune to all debuffs

special_rules.description: Heroes can use abilities twice per turn
Summon angel reinforcements when ally falls
Enemies below 30% HP are instantly defeated

special_mechanics.description: Enemies have 50% damage reduction
Every attack has 30% chance to smite
All enemies revive once

territories.description: The throne of the gods, gleaming with celestial light. To stand here is to touch divinity itself.

territories.name: Frozen Wastes

passive_effects.description: Attackers are slowed for 1 turn
Water heroes start with 20% HP shield

special_rules.description: All enemies are permanently slowed by 20%
Frozen enemies take 2x damage

special_mechanics.description: Immune to freeze but vulnerable to fire
Enemies are 50% larger with more HP

territories.description: An endless expanse of ice and snow, where frost giants roam. The cold here can freeze gods themselves.

territories.name: Volcanic Core

passive_effects.description: All attacks burn and deal +40% damage
Heroes revive once with 50% HP

special_rules.description: Battlefield damage increases 5% per turn
Random lava eruptions deal massive damage
Fire damage ignores all resistances

special_mechanics.description: Enemies regenerate 10% HP per turn
On death, enemies deal 50% max HP as area damage
Completely immune to fire damage
Heroes lose 5% max HP per turn

territories.description: The molten heart of the world, where fire elementals are born. Here burns the flame that forged reality.

tier_1.bonus: Unlock tier 2 heroes in summon pool

tier_2.bonus: Unlock tier 3 heroes in summon pool

territory_resonance.description: Territories with same element gods stationed boost each other

combat_integration.comment: How territories integrate with the new combat system
